content.subject: Admission in MBA Programme under the Department of Management, Humanities & Social Sciences of NIT Agartala for the 2025-26 Academic Session

program_details.department: Department of Management, Humanities & Social Sciences
program_details.reservation_policy: As per Govt. of India norms

steps: Register on the portal by clicking 'Apply Now'
Fill in Personal, Address, Educational Details, Photo & Signature
Upload supporting documents: DOB, experience certificates, extra-curricular activities
Make online payment of application fee (Rs. 500 for SC/ST/PwD, Rs. 1000 for others)
application_instructions.hard_copy_submission: Send completed offline application form along with relevant documents to MHSS department of NIT Agartala

required_documents: Proof of date of birth (10th Admit Card/Certificate)
All semester mark sheets of Qualifying Degree
Pass Certificate of Qualifying Degree (if applicable)
Experience certificates and certificates of Extra-Curricular Activities if any

eligibility.engineering_graduates: 60% marks or CGPA 6.0 in 10 point scale
eligibility.other_disciplines: 55% marks or CGPA 5.5 in 10 point scale
eligibility.relaxation: 5% marks or 0.5 CGPA for SC/ST candidates
eligibility.test: Valid CAT/CMAT/GMAT/MAT or Institute Level Test (ILT) conducted online

general_terms_conditions: Schedule may change due to unavoidable reasons
Institute may cancel candidature without reason
Prescribed qualifications are minimum; mere possession does not guarantee call for ILT/PA
Original documents must be produced during verification
Candidates should check website regularly for updates

annexures.Annexure_A: Undertaking for Final Year Appearing Candidate
annexures.Form_Application: Application form with personal, educational, work experience, extra-curricular details, and payment information
